column4: RAGE!! I'm trying to follow this guide https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Device/CompaqW200 but am getting the error "E: Couldn't find package linux-headers-2.6.24.19" please halp!
check your sources
sorry, but what does it mean to check my sources? what am I supposed to be checking in my sources?
check to make sure you have the default sources, also, can you paste the results of: uname -a      ?
I have the standard sources since this is a new install so I'm not sure what to be on the look out for in my software sources. "uname -r" gives 2.6.24-19-generic
I have the standard sources since this is a new install so I'm not sure what to be on the look out for in my software sources. "uname -r" gives 2.6.24-19-generic
and you cant find the headers for that?
nope, it's not finding them for some reason
in my source list I have "source code" checked
well, I would ask that you pastebin the error that you are having.  Maybe that can shed some light
http://pastebin.com/d653ceb23
what items should I have checked in Software Sources on the "Ubuntu Software" tab? Because everything is checked :/
well, you dont need sources
what release are you using?
ok, what about the "Third Party" tab? Anything in there need to be checked for this to work?
Hardy
in theory, all should be unchecked
ok, I checked them all and will retry
32bit?
yes
I don't think it's going to work lol, I have everything checked and all but it still can't find those kernel headers :S
but thanks for helping anyway. Das vidanya \o
